actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management

official_title: To direct the President to ensure that local governments may use Construction Manager at Risk procurement methods in carrying out certain activities under the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act, and for other purposes.
short_title: Streamlining FEMA Procurement Procedures Act of 2025

titles.title: Streamlining FEMA Procurement Procedures Act of 2025
Streamlining FEMA Procurement Procedures Act of 2025

To direct the President to ensure that local governments may use Construction Manager at Risk procurement methods in carrying out certain activities under the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act, and for other purposes.
